definitions.definition: a small piece of a substance with many even sides, that is formed naturally when the substance becomes solid
a clear mineral, such as quartz, used in making jewellery and attractive objects

examples.text: Every table had been set with fine china and crystal.

definitions.definition: a small piece of a mineral that some people believe has the power to bring health or happiness

examples.text: She claims that Smoky Quartz is a powerful healing crystal.

definitions.definition: a piece of glass or plastic that covers the face of a watch
a powerful illegal drug, methamphetamine, that looks like small pieces of glass

wordOrigin: late Old English (denoting ice or a mineral resembling it), from Old French cristal, from Latin crystallum, from Greek krustallos ‘ice, crystal’. The chemistry sense dates from the early 17th cent.
